name: Roger Dodger (Prototype)
description:
This is a simple game created for a GameDev.tv development course.

Roger is equally skilled at dodging obstacles as he is at dodging responsibility--- but he's a good designated flyer when his friends need a ride home from the party! Guide Rogers rocket to the landing pads to drop off his friends.

7 levels, more to come, this has become kind of a fun pet project to mess around with different levels / challenges. Eventually would love to add a passenger pickup mechanic, music sheets to change the song, and some graphical indication of passenger drop off.

-Hold space for thrusters
-Left / Right arrows for steering
-Land on target platform to proceed
-Hit Q to quit

Tip: Tap the thrusters combined with counter steering to hit the breaks. You only need to touch the landing pad-- not land correctly / cleanly!

My main goals for this project were to create a quirky arcade / mobile style game (I know I know it's a Windows build), with an easily modifiable level editing structure.

*All assets are home-brewed, from Kenney's Assets, or obtained from FreeSound.org under royalty free license.
